product_name: Big Agnes Triple Core Air Pad
long_description: With its 4.25 inches of thickness, the Big Agnes Triple Core Air Pad is deluxe. It's a 4-season pad that combines a layer of closed cell foam on top of an air chamber for warmth down to 0degF. Triple Core Air Pad is a great winter camping companion or just a comfy choice for your car-camping trips. R-value equals 6.0; most sleeping pads we sell range in R-value from 1.0 (minimally insulated) to 9.5 (well insulated). I-beam construction eliminates welded seams to reduce cold spots and ensures quick inflation/deflation, consistent airflow and stability. Durable, lightweight ripstop nylon top and bottom. Internal heat-reflective polyurethane coating boosts the warmth. Big Agnes Triple Core Air Pad includes a stuff sack and repair kit; repair kit is in a small pocket on the inside end of the stuff sack.
